biocontainers.name: stringmlst
biocontainers.summary: Fast k-mer based tool for multi locus sequence typing (mlst) directly from genome sequencing reads

biotools.summary: stringMLST is a tool for detecting the MLST of an isolate directly from the genome sequencing reads. stringMLST predicts the ST of an isolate in a completely assembly and alignment free manner.

bioschemas.name: stringMLST
bioschemas.summary: stringMLST is a tool for detecting the MLST of an isolate directly from the genome sequencing reads. stringMLST predicts the ST of an isolate in a completely assembly and alignment free manner.
